enWisdom: Spite is the vilest of flaws
Malice is a vile characteristic and a fatal sickness
Malice is a painful ailment and an infectious disease

Wisdom: الْحِقْدُ نَارٌ لَا تُطْفَأُ إِلَّا بِالظَّفَرِ [كَامِنَةٌ لَا يُطْفِئُهَا إِلَّا مَوْتٌ أَوْ ظَفَرٌ]
enWisdom: Spite is a fire that is not put out except by vanquish(It is a raging fire that is not put out by anything other than death or vanquish)
Malice is from the nature of the wicked
The most wicked characteristic is spite
The most rancorous heart is the heart of the spiteful
The cornerstone of flaws is spite
The weapon of evil is spite
The worst thing that resides in the heart is malice

Wisdom: طَهِّرُوا قُلُوبَكُمْ مِنَ الْحِقْدِ فَإِنَّهُ دَاءٌ مُوبِئٌ
enWisdom: Purify your hearts from malice, for it is an infectious disease

Wisdom: مَنِ اطَّرَحَ الْحِقْدَ اسْتَرَاحَ قَلْبُهُ وَلُبُّهُ
enWisdom: One who eliminates malice [from his heart], his heart and mind become relaxed
